nodes.text: Bryint was a male Human Republic soldier who served in the Republic Army of the Galactic Republic's during the Cold War and Galactic War against the reconstituted Sith Empire, during which he was stationed on the space station Carrick Station.

Bryint appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released in 2011, as the Ord Mantell Commendations Vendor on Carrick Station, though with the retirement of the planetary commendation system Bryint was relabeled as a Level 8 Equipment Vendor. He was removed along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
